NAME.Nominative: St. Boniface the Merciful, Bishop of Ferentino

LIFE.Copyright: Bulgakov Handbook. Copyright 1999-2008 Archpriest Eugene D. Tarris.

SAINT.LIFE: He was born in the province of Tuscany, Italy and lived in the Sixth Century. He was glorified for disinterestedness, love for the poor and working wonders.
